content:
We've all been there with getting dates mixed up.

As for sports bars, I'm a large language model, I don't have access to real-time information about specific locations or businesses. However, I can suggest a few ways to find a good sports bar in your area that might be showing the Manchester City game:

1. **Google Search**: Try searching for "sports bars near me" or "Manchester City game watching party near me" on Google. You can also specify your city or zip code to get more localized results.
2. **Yelp**: Check out Yelp's list of sports bars in your area and filter the results by rating, distance, or amenities. You can also read reviews to see if other customers have mentioned showing Premier League games.
3. **Facebook Events**: Look for Facebook events in your area that might be hosting a Manchester City game viewing party. You can also join local sports fan groups or Manchester City fan groups to ask for recommendations.
4. **Ask Friends or Coworkers**: Ask your friends, coworkers, or fellow Manchester City fans if they know of any good sports bars in the area that might be showing the game.

Remember to call ahead and confirm that the sports bar will be showing the Manchester City game before heading out. Good luck, and I hope you find a great spot to watch the game with fellow fans!
